EmailTemplate.description: Sent for new volunteer signups or when volunteer lookup is performed
EmailTemplate.name: Volunteer Information
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Volunteering Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
Here is the link to click to access your Volunteer information dashboard:
Your Volunteer Information
By accessing this dashboard you can see your volunteering history, sign up for shifts, cancel shifts and report volunteer hours.
We recommend you flag or star this email so you can find it easily for future use.
Thank you for volunteering with Us.
Regards, Admin Team
